title: Drawing, "Saint in Ecstacy, After Franceschini; Classicized Version of Vision of St. Catherine of Vigri, Study after Franceschini", 1821–22
medium: Pen and ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on heavy white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Franceschini Bologna; at lower left: 13 Franceschini Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of seated Virgin on clouds with four angels; Lower drawing of landscape with Venus and male(?) figure on shell-backed throne. At Venus' right stands torch-bearer; at her left, winged-male figure with lyre; woman kneels at her feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Saint in Ecstacy, After Franceschini; Classicized Version of Vision of St. Catherine of Vigri, Study after Franceschini", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on heavy white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3560-1.
